generatedPrompts.backCover: A simple, yet elegant design in a dreamy fantasy anime style. On the left and top sides of the card, a whimsical garland of glowing, pastel-colored star-shaped confetti and iridescent bubbles cascades gently downwards against a soft, twilight-colored background. One oversized, beautifully detailed bubble in the center subtly reflects the enchanted forest from the front cover. The design is minimal and serene, creating a peaceful resolution. The bottom-right corner area is left completely blank and undecorated. Flat 2D artwork, full-bleed.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
A dreamy fantasy anime style illustration of two joyful, cartoon twin girls with flowing, pastel-colored hair (one pink, one lavender) dancing together in a magical forest clearing. They are surrounded by glowing, oversized mushrooms and floating, iridescent soap bubbles that shimmer with rainbow colors. One girl gives the other a playful kiss on the cheek. A shower of sparkling pixie dust and tiny, whimsical star-shaped confetti falls around them. The background is a soft-focus enchanted woodland at twilight, with gentle light filtering through a canopy of glowing trees. In the center, the text 'Happy Birthday!' is written in a beautiful, clearly readable, flowing handwritten cursive script in a shimmering gold color. The entire scene is vibrant and energetic, with a soft, magical glow. Flat 2D artwork, full-bleed.

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided multiple reference photos as input images. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent the people in these reference photos with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS:
- REPRESENT ALL PEOPLE: If multiple reference photos are provided, create cartoon versions of ALL people shown, bringing them together in the same scene
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles worn by each person in their reference photo
- COMPLETE accessories: include ALL accessories visible on each person (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.)
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

Little girl kissing woman’s cheek 

The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Every person in the reference must be represented with their exact appearance, clothing, and accessories.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A stunning, full-bleed illustration in a dreamy fantasy anime style. The scene depicts a magical, whimsical landscape featuring two enormous, intricately decorated birthday cakes sitting side-by-side on a field of glowing grass. Each cake is a fantastical creation, adorned with cascading pastel frosting, sparkling sugar crystals, and topped with a single, brightly glowing candle. Colorful, whimsical birds with sparkling tails fly around the cakes, leaving trails of light. The atmosphere is energetic and celebratory, with a soft, magical glow permeating the scene. Flat 2D artwork, full-bleed, no people.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A beautiful, full-bleed background in a dreamy fantasy anime style with a soft, pastel color palette. The message is elegantly framed by an intricate, asymmetrical design of glowing vines, whimsical star-shaped confetti, and sparkling pixie dust that swirls gracefully around the text. The design elements are concentrated in the corners, leaving a clear, luminous area in the center for the message. In the center, the message is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script with a dark, shimmering ink: 'Happy Birthday to our favorite birthday twins, Vivi and Audrey! It's pretty clear that greatness decided to strike twice on the same day, and we're so glad we get to celebrate both of you. May your day be filled with double the cake, double the fun, and only half the shenanigans... maybe. Lots of Love, The Gilberts'. Flat 2D artwork, full-bleed, no people.
